title: What to Expect from Chronicles: Alexander the Great!
description: The release of Chronicles: Alexander the Great is nearly here for Age of Empires II: Definitive Edition! If you’ve played Chronicles: Battle for Greece, you already know the incredible ride you're in for. If you're entirely new to the Chronicles series, we want to share more about exactly what you can expect, and to get you as excited as we are!

title: Age of Mythology: Retold Update 18.50572
description: Welcome heroes to a very exciting update for Age of Mythology: Retold! In this release we have a new alternate portrait for Ame-no-Uzume, a mini-map size update for KBM users, matchmaking improvements, minor balance changes, and bug fixes, and of biggest note – updated Mod functionality to match the release of Heavenly Spear. So, get a sneak peek at the notes before jumping in game!

title: Age of Mythology: Retold Update 18.49472
description: Welcome heroes to a very exciting update for Age of Mythology: Retold! Loaded with so many exciting new things including new cheat codes, matchmaking improvements, balance changes, and, of course, the launch of the newest expansion, Heavenly Spear! So get a sneak peek at the notes before jumping in game!

title: Play Heavenly Spear and the New Gauntlet in Age of Mythology: Retold
description: Call upon a powerful roster of gods, command heroes, and summon the yokai of Japan in the all-new expansion available now: Heavenly Spear! Play a sweeping 12-mission campaign, wield the powers of the entirely new Japanese Pantheon, and so much more! Plus jump into the newest game mode: the Gauntlet! Heavenly Spear is not all … Continued

title: Chronicles: Alexander the Great Campaign Preview
description: With Battle for Greece, the Chronicles series established a well-deserved reputation for epic campaign content, with widespread praise for its writing and voice acting, innovative level design, historical authenticity, beautiful maps, and characterful cutscenes. A tough act to follow – but Chronicles: Alexander the Great takes the series to a whole new level. With every … Continued
